prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with a sleek, aerodynamic design and bright turquoise scales.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a ghostly dragon, featuring a dark cape and glowing eyes.
Show me a flying-type Pokemon with a unique double-headed design and vibrant colors.
Design a mystical creature that combines elements of dragons and ghosts, showcasing ethereal features.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies both dragon and ghost traits, with a mysterious aura and elegant body.
Give me a dragon Pokemon that has a playful demeanor and hauntingly beautiful design.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a small dragon with a spectral presence and intricate details.
